name: Gooberry
description: Gooberry is an indica-dominant strain descended from legendary parents Afgoo and Blueberry. This fruity, spicy strain will leave you giggling on your couch with upward of 20% THC. Consumers highly recommend this strain for night time use to treat pain and insomnia, and it's sure to leave you with the munchies. Like most indicas, Gooberry will flower in 7-9 weeks with a short, bushy structure.
descriptionPlain: Gooberry is an indica-dominant strain descended from legendary parents Afgoo and Blueberry. This fruity, spicy strain will leave you giggling on your couch with upward of 20% THC. Consumers highly recommend this strain for night time use to treat pain and insomnia, and it's sure to leave you with the munchies. Like most indicas, Gooberry will flower in 7-9 weeks with a short, bushy structure.

highlightedReviews.text:
Again, another entry into my favorite strains. Don't pass this one up!!

Initial thoughts upon smoking this strain: The onset of this strain brings around a warming sensation that centralizes in a point on the forehead. This then spreads to create what I explain as a sauna towel wrapped around the head. This seems to wash over the whole body, but most noticeably on the shoulders and head. Brought a slight sense of tingly arousal.

During: The strain continued to bring a deep state of relaxation and warmth. In addition, a focused, meditative tunnel vision ensued. There was a sense of couch lock not due to leaden sluggishness, but from comfort instead. This tunnel vision would not be conducive to instances that require much outward concentration.

Down: Left slightly irritable, due to feeling amazing for so long.

Overall: This strain is perfect for reading a book, listening to music, playing a video game, or meditating. It offers unparalleled relaxation and stress relief. Good for muscle pain!

It's a sure winner in my book. I was continually recommending this to patients for a wide variety of ailments with a very slim negative list. It felt like a 60i/40s strain. The sativa side left me mentally stimulated and energized. This perfectly accompanies the deep relaxation to stay functional.

üí¶üçìüçá as the name suggests gooberry is a lovely flower with tight dense nugs, pungent smell, a flavor between Earth Berry and gas or when I call my favorite! Definitely a winner and not overly sweet for my gassy taste buds. All around great medicine. From just relaxing to deep thinking this will get it doneüòâ üí¶üçáüçì
